title: Embarcadero Delphi XE5 with Update 1
description:
What's New in RAD Studio XE5?

RAD Studio provides the best development XE5 multidevice for PCs, tablets and smartphones. Use the new features in RAD Studio XE5 to create applications for Android, iOS, Windows and Mac; connect more data, more easily, just to start!
What's New in RAD Studio XE5?

    ARM compiler for Android in Delphi for device and emulator
    FM platform for creating native applications for the Android Gingerbread (2.3.3 - 2.3.7), Ice Cream Sandwich (4.0.3, 4.0.4) and Jelly Bean (4.1.x, 4.2.x, 4.3.x) *.
    Support styles and iOS SDK 7
    Time Picker Control for Android, Windows, OS X and iOS
    Component Notification Center for iOS and Android
    Integrated filter to search for TListView on Android, iOS, Windows and OS X
    Swipe to delete on Android and iOS
    Support Share Sheet on Android and iOS
    Performance improvements of FM platform
    Delphi RTL for Android
    Distribution Manager for Android
    Distribute applications to the emulator for Ice Cream Sandwich and Jelly Bean
    Distribute applications for Android devices (Debug / App Store)
    Remote debugging to Android
    The Professional version includes support FireDAC extended to local databases, including Microsoft Access, SQLite, InterBase ToGo / IBLite, InterBase, localhost embedded MySQL, MySQL Server on localhost, Advantage Database Local engine, localhost PostgreSQL, Firebird embedded, and Firebird on localhost
    IBLite embeddable database for Android and iOS with free license for unlimited distribution
    REST Client Library for invoking REST services in a simplified
    Authorization support, including Basic Authentication, Plans, OAuth1, OAuth2
    TRestClient components, and TRestRequest TRestResponse
    Debugging tool for testing REST REST calls and their parameters
    Multiple Selection in Distribution Manager
    Search box for easy access in the IDE Insight
    Device Manager to manage and select the default device in FM Mobile Form designer
    Libraries upgrade HTML5 Builder (PhoneGap, jQuery Mobile, jQuery and ThemeRoller) 

Among others ...!
Create True Native Apps for iOS and Android
Create truly native applications for Android and iOS

Create mobile applications using the skills, knowledge and programming code that you already own. Your Android and iOS have fast native performance and better security than web based applications or scripting languages. Use the full visual designer for interfaces with multiple iOS device types, resolutions and orientations.
RAD Studio Platform
RAD Platform Application multidevice

The development of mobile applications often extends beyond the device, requiring support real-time communication and access to corporate data and services in the cloud. The Application Platform multidevice Delphi makes it possible for developers to create truly one computer connected to the device through back-end services in multiple client operating systems and considering the physical configuration of multiple devices. Connect your applications and services quickly to corporate databases via local infrastructure or in the cloud with connectivity to the corporate database FireDAC, middleware DataSnap n-tier, plus access to RESTful web services via cloud-based providers MBaaS .
One Team One Codebase Development of truly native applications multidevice

Now Android was added to the solution application development multidevice RAD Studio, which means you do not need to maintain separate development projects to create their applications natively on multiple platforms (Android, iOS, Windows and OS X). The RAD Studio XE5 facilitates the creation of truly native applications and free scripts that take full advantage of the capabilities and performance of the underlying devices.
Mobile Wizard Access to RESTful web services based on cloud

The Delphi XE5 has a new REST library, available on all platforms and focused on streamlining called REST web services by any third party provider. The library includes support for authentication and JSON response handling, with mappings and LiveBindings dataset. The three core components facilitate the creation parameters of their requests in different ways, as well as access to hundreds of web services. This technology allows you to work with Mobile Backend as a Service and use the features MBaaS.

Among its functions include the following:

    REST Client Library for invoking REST services in a simplified
    Authorization support, including Basic Authentication, Plans, OAuth1, OAuth2
    TRestClient components, and TRestRequest TRestResponse
    Debugging tool for testing REST REST calls and their parameters 

FireDAC Logo02 193x175 Integrated access to more databases on more devices with FireDAC

Components and drivers database FireDAC now widely integrated into RAD Studio, Delphi and the C + + Builder. The FireDAC gives you direct access, native, high-speed Delphi and C + + Builder to InterBase, SQLite, MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, PostgreSQL, DB2, SQL Anywhere, Advantage DB, Firebird, Access, Informix, DataSnap and many other databases and mobile business, local or embedded. Migrate easily from BDE and other technologies.

    Local connectivity / inlaid FireDAC the selected databases in the Professional versions of RAD Studio, Delphi and C + + Builder
    Local connectivity / embedded and remote FireDAC a wide range of databases in versions Enterprise, Ultimate and Architect, or by purchasing the package add-on client / server version Professional 

iOS user interface control Support Database Mobile Android and iOS

RAD Studio includes support XE5 database site for iOS and Android and SQLite embedded InterBase via dbExpress, IBX and FireDAC. You also receive a free distribution license and unlimited IBLite for Android and iOS - a new version of the popular free distribution database InterBase ToGo.
